Module
public
GITEICaptoglove.​Module
GITEICaptoglove.​MyArm
GITEICaptoglove.​MyHand

Handles Captoglove module. Used by MyHand and MyArm.

Author
Laura Moreno

laamo[xxx]renoro@unal.[xxx]edu.co

Copyrigth

Copyrigth 2020 GITEI Universidad Nacional de Colombia, all rigths reserved.

Types

Enum: peModuleType List of possible ways to use Captoglove module:

TYPE_RIGHT_HAND

As right hand sensor

TYPE_LEFT_HAND

As left hand sensor

TYPE_RIGHT_ARM

As low right arm sensor

TYPE_LEFT_ARM

As low left arm sensor

peModuleType
protected enum peModuleType
eModuleAxis
public enum eModuleAxis

List of axes:

AXIS_X

X axis

AXIS_Y

Y axis

AXIS_Z

Z axis

InitModule
protected void InitModule(
int nID,
peModuleType eType
)

Initializes variables for Captoglove module configuration.

Parameters
nID
int

Captoglove ID (4 digits number)

etype
peModuleType

Captoglove use mode

Example
InitModule(2496, Module.peModuleType.TYPE_RIGHT_HAND);
SetModuleType
private void SetModuleType(
peModuleType eType
)

Saves Captoglove module use mode.

Parameters
enType

Captoglove module use mode

Example
SetModuleType(Module.peModuleType.TYPE_RIGHT_HAND);
GetModuleType
protected peModuleType GetModuleType()
Returns

Captoglove module use mode

SetModuleID
private void SetModuleID(
int nID
)

Saves Captoglove module ID.

Parameters
nID
int

Captoglove module ID (4 digits number)

Example
SetModuleID(2496);
GetModuleID
protected int GetModuleID()
Returns

Captoglove module ID

SetModuleName
private void SetModuleName()

Creates and saves Captoglove module name.

Notes

SetModuleID() must be called first

GetModuleName
protected string GetModuleName()
Returns

Captoglove module name

SetModuleInitialized
private void SetModuleInitialized(
bool b
)

Saves whether Captoglove module is initialized or not.

Parameters
b
bool

true or false

Example
SetModuleInitialized(true);
Notes

Normally used after InitModule() function is completed.

GetModuleInitialized
protected bool GetModuleInitialized()
Returns
true

Captoglove module initialized

false

Captoglove module NOT initialized

SetModuleStarted
private void SetModuleStarted(
bool b
)

Saves whether Captoglove module is started or not.

Parameters
b
bool

true or false

Example
SetModuleStarted(true);
Notes

Normally used after Start() function is completed.

GetModuleStarted
protected bool GetModuleStarted()
Returns
true

Captoglove module started

false

Captoglove module NOT started

SetPropertiesRead
private void SetPropertiesRead(
bool b
)

Saves whether Captoglove module properties have been read or not.

Parameters
b
bool

true or false

Example
SetPropertiesRead(true);
Notes

Normally used after ReadProperties() function is completed.

GetPropertiesRead
public bool GetPropertiesRead()
Returns
true

Captoglove module properties have been read

false

Captoglove module properties have NOT been read

EnableLog
public void EnableLog()

Enables log printing during your app execution.

Notes

Log can be added with TraceLog() function.

DisableLog
public void DisableLog()

Disables log printing during your app execution.

GetLogEnabled
private bool GetLogEnabled()
Returns
true

Log printing is enabled

false

Log printing is disabled

Start
public int Start()

Starts looking for Captoglove module peripheral.

Returns
0

Success

-1

Error: Module not initialized

Notes

Call this function in the Start() of your application.

Central_PeripheralsChanged
private async void Central_PeripheralsChanged(
object sender,
PeripheralsEventArgs e
)

Looks for Captoglove module ID among the modules that are connected to bluetooth.

Parameres
sender

Unused parameter

e

String received from Captoglove module

Peripheral_PropertyChanged
private void Peripheral_PropertyChanged(
object sender,
PropertyChangedEventArgs e
)

Detects if Captoglove module is connected to your app.

Parameres
sender

Unused parameter

e

String received from Captoglove module

Peripheral_StreamReceived
private void Peripheral_StreamReceived(
object sender,
BoardStreamEventArgs e
)

Captures continuously stream events from Captoglove module connected.

Parameres
sender

Unused parameter

e

Stream of events from Captoglove module

SetProperties
private void SetProperties()

Set Captoglove module properties by default: Calibrate module, Tare module, Set time slots and Commit changes.

Notes

This function overwrites previous module configuration.

ReadProperties
private async void ReadProperties()

Read Captoglove module properties: Firmware version, Emulation mode, Time slots and Sensors calibration.

Stop
public async void Stop()

Stops communication with Captoglove module.

Notes

Call this function in the OnDestroy() of your application.

TraceLog
protected void TraceLog(
string s
)

Prints log lines during your app execution.

Example
TraceLog("This is a log message in my app");
Notes

Log is printed only if EnableLog() function is called first.
